languages.text: "Мудрое решение, элантах. Надеюсь, ты найдешь в себе силы вновь обрести верный путь. Пока я рядом, я помогу тебе в его поисках".
"A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."
languages.original_text: "Мудрое решение, элантах. Надеюсь, ты найдешь в себе силы вновь обрести верный путь. Пока я рядом, я помогу тебе в его поисках".

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the right path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the right path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Sabia decisión, elantach. Confío en que encontrarás la fuerza necesaria para regresar a la auténtica senda. Mientras esté a tu lado, te ayudaré a encontrar el camino de vuelta».
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: «Sabia decisión, elantach. Confío en que encontrarás la fuerza necesaria para regresar a la auténtica senda. Mientras esté a tu lado, te ayudaré a encontrar el camino de vuelta».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这是个明智的决定，外界人。我希望你能找到回归正道的力量。只要我还在你身边，我就会帮助你找到它。”
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: “这是个明智的决定，外界人。我希望你能找到回归正道的力量。只要我还在你身边，我就会帮助你找到它。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Sage décision, elantach. J'espère que vous trouverez la force de revenir dans le droit chemin. Sachez que, tant que je resterai à vos côtés, je vous y aiderai. »
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: « Sage décision, elentach. J'espère que vous trouverez la force de revenir dans le droit chemin. Sachez que, tant que je resterai à vos côtés, je vous y aiderai. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「賢明な決断だ、エランタ。あなたが真の道に戻る力を見つけることを願っている。私があなたの側にいる限り、あなたが戻る道を見つける手助けをしよう」
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: 「賢明な決断だ、エランタ。あなたが真の道に戻る力を見つけることを願っている。私があなたの側にいる限り、あなたが戻る道を見つける手助けをしよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eine weise Entscheidung, Elantach. Ich hoffe, Ihr findet die Kraft, wieder auf den wahren Pfad zurückzukehren. So lange ich an Eurer Seite bin, werde ich Euch helfen, den Weg zurückzufinden."
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: "Eine weise Entscheidung, Elantach. Ich hoffe, Ihr findet die Kraft, wieder auf den wahren Pfad zurückzukehren. So lange ich an Eurer Seite bin, werde ich Euch helfen, den Weg zurückzufinden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Akıllıca bir karar elantach. Umarım doğru yola dönebilecek gücü bulursun. Yanında oldukça yolunu bulmana yardım edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, elantach. I hope you find the strength to return to the true path. For as long as I am at your side, I will help you find your way back."

traits.locale_text: "Akıllıca bir karar elantach. Umarım doğru yola dönebilecek gücü bulursun. Ben senin yanında oldukça, yolunu bulmana yardım edeceğim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
